badger:molang_scripts.healing_stop: variable.is_healing = 0;variable.fx_healing = 0; variable.skin_mat = variable.skin_mat_saved;  variable.second_skin_vis =  (variable.is_healing == 0 && variable.is_spore_damaged == 0 && variable.is_cauldron_buffed == 0) ? 0 : 1;
badger:molang_scripts.spore_damaged_stop: variable.fx_spore_damaged = 0; variable.is_spore_damaged = 0; variable.skin_mat = variable.skin_mat_saved;  variable.second_skin_vis =  (variable.is_healing == 0 && variable.is_spore_damaged == 0 && variable.is_cauldron_buffed == 0) ? 0 : 1;
badger:molang_scripts.frozen_off: variable.is_frozen = 0; variable.skin_mat = variable.skin_mat_saved;  variable.second_skin_vis = (variable.is_healing == 0 && variable.is_spore_damaged == 0 && variable.is_cauldron_buffed == 0) ? 0 : 1;
badger:molang_scripts.cauldron_stop: variable.is_cauldron_buffed = 0; variable.skin_mat = variable.skin_mat_saved;  variable.second_skin_vis = (variable.is_healing == 0 && variable.is_spore_damaged == 0 && variable.is_frozen == 0)  ? 0 : 1;
